tool_description: Food2Fork is a place to find top socially ranked recipes from tons of recipe blogs and websites.
name: Food2Fork
title: Food2Fork

api_list.name: Get Recipe

optional_parameters.name: rId
optional_parameters.description: rId: Id of desired recipe as returned by Search Query

api_list.name: Search

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: q: (optional) Search Query (Ingredients should be separated by commas). If this is omitted top rated recipes will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: sort: (optional) How the results should be sorted. The Food2Fork API offers two kinds of sorting for queries. The first is by rating. This rating is based off of social media scores to determine the best recipes. sort=r The second is by trendingness. The most recent recipes from our publishers have a trend score based on how quickly they are gaining popularity. sort=t

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: page: (optional) Used to get additional results. Any request will return a maximum of 30 results. To get the next set of results send the same request again but with page = 2  The default if omitted is page = 1
